bwwExcerpt: What I miss in this production is the strong sense of place that you take for granted in a western movie. As lovely as Mr. Moyer's set is, I wish it were dirtier, just as I wish that Mr. Greif had brought in a diction coach.Â These aren't quibbles, but in the end they don't matter, for the show comes through triumphantly in spite of them.
